Dijkstra help

Node looks like this. Node has a name in the center and discoverd distance (N1.d) below.

Nodes that are currently in queue are gray like this.

Nodes that are solved are green like this.

Edges look like this. Edge has its weight c(N1, N2) above.

When algorithm scans edge but does not update distance of end node (N9) it turns orange like this.

When algorithm scans edge and updates distance of end node (N2) it turns red like this.
